Package org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.condition

Interface JavaClassBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.Condition, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.ConditionBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaClass
    public interface JavaClassBuilder
extends org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.ConditionBuilder
    Fluent builder for JavaClass Condition.
    Author:
    Lincoln Baxter, III

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.ConditionBuilder as​(String variable)
      Specify the the variable in which to store matching JavaTypeReferenceModel results, and complete the builder, returning a fully configured Condition object.
      JavaClassBuilderAt at​(TypeReferenceLocation... locations)
      Specify one or more TypeReferenceLocation where the specified regex is of interest.
      JavaClassBuilderInFile inType​(String regex)
      Specify a regex that filters against FileModel.getPrettyPathWithinProject().
      JavaClassBuilderLineMatch matchesSource​(String regex)
      Specify the exact regex for the line to match (useful to distinguish hard-coded strings etc.)
